title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.7 - Sales on credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.7 - Sales on credit

State Regulations
(a) Sales of
wine made to a householder by a winery licensee having the right to sell wine
at retail may not be made on credit. (b) Sales of wine made to a church, synagogue
or religious organization for sacramental purposes by a winery or a wholesale
liquor or wine licensee having the right to sell wine at retail may be made on
credit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
63.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
